mapper.sql: a.seq, a.delNy, a.name, b.name as codeGroupName

FROM code a LEFT JOIN codeGroup b ON b.delNy = 0 AND b.seq = a.codeGroup_seq WHERE 1=1
AND ( a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shKeyword},'%') OR b.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shKeyword},'%') )
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shKeyword},'%') AND b.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shKeyword},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT seq, delNy, name, codeGroup_seq FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE code SET name = #{name}, codeGroup_seq = #{codeGroup_seq} WHERE seq = #{seq}
UPDATE code SET delNy = "1" WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT seq, name, codegroup_seq FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND delNy = 0
